HELPER_TEXT.OTH_EMAIL: The email needs to have the suffix of @st.oth-regensburg.de
HELPER_TEXT.DISABLED_MAIL: The email can not be reassigned
HELPER_TEXT.GITHUB_CONNECTION: This service requires GitHub account authorization as a verification method to ensure the correct user is accessing the system.

AUTH.CONFIRM_EMAIL: We're excited to have you get stared. First, you need to confirm your account by clicking the link we have send to your email address.

RESPONSE.INVALID_LOGIN: Username and Password are not matching.
RESPONSE.UNCONFIRMED_EMAIL: The email was NOT confirmed yet! Check your email.
